**My education**\

- Master of Science ETH in Atmospheric and Climate Science, Zurich, Switzerland (2018)\
- Bachelor of Science ETH in Earth Sciences, Zurich, Switzerland (2016)\

**My research interests**\
Large-scale physical oceanography from the tropics to the high southern latitudes, ocean-sea ice modelling, internal climate variability and its atmospheric teleconnections, ocean heat content, Central European atmospheric circulation

**Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals**\

**Acknowledgment of Country**\
I pay my respect to the Traditional Owners, the Bedegal and Wampanoag People, who have cared for this land, sea and water that I live and work on across Australia and the United States. I acknowledge that this land was stolen from them, and that sovereignty has never been ceded. There can be no climate justice without justice for First Nations people.
